name: The Pied Piper: Riddles of the Rats
name_original: The Pied Piper: Riddles of the Rats
description:
A short game by Carsten Booth & Porter Crease
Play as the Pied Piper as you are tasked by the King to rid the village of an infestation of rats! Use your trusty pipe to solve their riddles and charm them away from the village.

Stuck? Check out the video playthrough!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move
Use C, D, E, F, G, A, B to play notes and solve riddles
